Articles.Content: hello does anyone have a replica for the ISS with stock parts?

This is more for show then functionality

My very first major KSP project, an ISS replica... back when I first bought the game, (and before I knew about parts count), its too laggy to be functional, but I'm proud of it regardless... Took me 72 hours to finish it, did it all in the span of 5 days, needless to say I was TIRED after building this lol. I made this screenshot my mission flag

Links to other Shared projects I have created:

The Agamemnon (Exoplanetary Outpost Deployment System: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51494-The-Agamemnon-%28Exoplanetary-Outpost-Deployment-System%29-D

Challenge accepted!

Going to resize solar panels for larger size

do you have a download link for your ISS modules so i can assemble it in orbit?

@deepspacecreeper: I'm Sorry this screenshot is all I have available for download. I guess you could use it as a template, but I warn you this thing is over 1200 parts.

Like I said this was my very first major project just a few days after I bought the game, TONS of superfluous parts and no action groups.

You may wanna remove the small ladders on your version for example.
there's one by teo
